price: Enti ne Wura Nyankopͻn tiee ne sufrε, na Ɔyii wͻn adwen bͻne no firii no so. Nokorε sε, Ɔne Mpaebͻ Tiefoͻ no, na Ɔno ara nso ne Onimdefoͻ no a Ɔnim biribiara no.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
